Type.Name: SelectPageHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SelectPageHandler(object o, SelectPageArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SelectPageHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SelectPageHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SelectPageHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SelectPageHandler is removed from the event.
